Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the length of the highway, stating it is 880 km long, when it is actually a 240 km section of the Beijing-Kunming highway.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that China has built a specific highway connecting their country with Pakistan.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the viral video showing the highway is indeed the highway connecting China and Pakistan, without verifying its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: The video in question is actually of the Yaxi expressway in Sichuan, China, and not a highway connecting China and Pakistan.
